meaningMnemonic: Use your <radical>mouth</radical> to sing and a <radical>shellfish</radical> to stroke your shamisen, and you'll be performing a <kanji>shamisen song</kanji> just like that! Yes, it's that easy. Just go find a shell, open your mouth, and you'll be singing one too in no time!
readingMnemonic: A <kanji>shamisen song</kanji> is just an <reading>歌</reading> (うた) but with a shamisen. They're still songs so they're said the exact same way!
